thread.section_title: Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Staff make it great
thread.title_full: Staff make it great - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: James J
title: Staff make it great
text: All the staff were amazing. From the house maids, cooks, reception staff to the waitresses they were all friendly, warm and caring people. Hotel was very clean. All the staff should be praised. Sound transfer between rooms not perfect but certainly one of the better hotels I've stayed in.
